page.shortlink: api client api a5 chart u callout add method
page.description: The callout add method is used to add a callout to the chart.

discussion.p: This method is used to add a callout label to the chart. The callout will be rendered last, allowing for better layout of the callout labels when grouped.

property.name: html
property.description: The HTML for the callout label.

property.name: point
property.description: The point to draw the callout from. Can either be an array or object. If an array is passed in, then the order of values will be "x", "y", "angle" and "offset".

property.name: angle
property.description: The "angle" the callout should start at. Value can either be a number, or "auto" (the default).

property.name: offset
property.description: The optional "offset" from the point the callout should start at.

property.name: drawSettings
property.description: The label draw settings. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Label Object]*.

property.name: data
property.description: The chart data. See *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*.
